summary: Planted in a Tokyo crime syndicate, a U.S. Army Investigator attempts to probe the coinciding death of a fellow Army official.
cast: Robert Ryan|Robert Stack|Shirley Yamaguchi|Cameron Mitchell|Brad Dexter|Sessue Hayakawa|Biff Elliot|Sandro Giglio|Elko Hanabusa|Clifford Arashiro|Sandy Azeka|Harry Carey Jr.|Barry Coe|Fred Dale|John Doucette|Fuji|Samuel Fuller|Peter Gray|Reiko Hayakawa|Robert Hosai|Kazue Ikeda|Kinuko Ann Ito|Camille Janclaire|Frank Jumagai|DeForest Kelley|Robert Kino|Frank Kwanaga|Richard Loo|Jack Maeshiro|Harris Matsushige|Rollin Moriyama|Neyle Morrow|Bob Okazaki|Robert Quarry|Bob Roberts|Reiko Sato|Teru Shimada|May Takasugi|Barbara Uchiyamada|Everett Weaver
